title: RefleXes [Android]
description: Small commercial APP to train your reaction time and kill some time

data: Small game/app for I developed to learn the process of developing for Android and publishing on Google Play Store.

Features a Infinite game where your task is to tap on the good dots and avoid the bad ones as long and fast as possible. The good dots do give you score points, while a single tap on a bad one will end the game and show your score. There are a bunch of settings to customize the game, that prevail across game sessions.
